review_details: I visted the small cycladic island of Anafi for work at January and stayed at Ostria Rooms. The island was beautyful even at that time of the year. The view from the apartment which is at the top of the hill it's just out of this world!
If you ever pass by Dusseldorf, you just have to visit this place. As a Mechanical Engineer it was orgasmic!! A pint with these beauties by your side is a MUST.

If you ever visit Milos this is a must-do experience. Fresh fish, the greek sun and sea with crystal clear water create an amazing feelling. You won't regret this for sure. As for captain Nikos and Froso what can I say, they are so heart-warming and authentic people that they made our trip just unforgetable.
Thymalos is one of the greatest choice (if not the greatest) in Zante, the food, the decoration and the vibes are just amazing. Just.. Greece in every corner of it!
Enjoying German beer with sausages in the old city of Frankfurt. Perfect place to take a walk, feeling the local vibes of an older time!
The music was nice, the beers and atmosphere as well. Normal prices for Athens. Α very good choice for this area.
